shopifyAppApi.key: App API key provided by Shopify, for example: 4ac...35f
shopifyAppApi.secretKey: App API secret key provided by Shopify, for example: 59c...07f

shopifyShop.myShopifySubdomainName: Shopify subdomain for your store, if you access foo.myshopify.com/admin then use: foo
shopifyShop.oAuthAccessToken: OAuth access token for the store held by your app, for example: a19...546a

shopifyShopApp.apiKey: Private App API key provided by Shopify, for example: 83d...94a
shopifyShopApp.password: Private App API password provided by Shopify, for example: 7a2...35d
